52680E8A3EA24C7FB2413B8B95CC9771.description: A student demonstrates awareness of how to reflect on aspects of their own and others’ learning

D7895CAF35AE4A14960FEDE22BD71975.description: A student responds to and composes simple texts about familiar aspects of the world and their own experiences

80A7EFCAA8CA4013BDF185C562B6D331.description: A student thinks imaginatively and creatively about familiar topics, simple ideas and the basic features of texts when responding to and composing texts

93D87538631E49D3B259AA1023CC8617.description: A student demonstrates developing skills and knowledge in grammar, punctuation and vocabulary when responding to and composing texts

684AEB6E444B4C43BFEDE226D31D08BC.description: A student demonstrates emerging skills and knowledge of texts to read and view, and shows developing awareness of purpose, audience and subject matter

8396E255F30D41A2B937BE58E2E0C8E7.description: A student recognises some different purposes for writing and that own texts differ in various ways

1237BA4526484EF3821041BEB0E9EB44.description: A student recognises that there are different kinds of spoken texts with specific language features and shows an emerging awareness of some purposes for spoken language

5E720ADF9008402694F72B7C8CEFB67B.description: A student demonstrates developing skills and strategies to read, view and comprehend short, predictable texts on familiar topics in different media and technologies

63188AEC5C124EEB94C0A40756FD2421.description: A student composes simple texts to convey an idea or message

DA9D0D14E9E04B308E4C0D93DF5AD8C3.description: A student communicates with peers and known adults in informal and guided activities demonstrating emerging skills of group interaction
